update internal_contract_info set contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_date = #{contractDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, receipt_date = #{receiptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date_time = #{createDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_boxes = #{totalBoxes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, real_money = #{realMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_date = #{storeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from internal_contract_info where 1 = 1
and contract_no like '%${contractNo}%'
and contract_date >= '${contractStartDate}'
and contract_date <= '${contractEndDate}'
and status in (${status})
and status != '0'
order by id desc
limit ${start},${limit}

select count(1) from internal_contract_info where 1 = 1
and contract_no like '%${contractNo}%'
and contract_date >= '${contractStartDate}'
and contract_date <= '${contractEndDate}'
and status in (${status})
and status != '0'
order by id desc
